name: Tanks Blood
description:
📣Tanks Blood a Multiplayer/Singleplayer Game will be Released in PC/Android.
In Tanks Blood, Your mission is to defend your military base at all costs. The enemy tanks roll closer and closer.
In front of you, there are countless hordes of enemies.

Release Date: 24/02/2021

The game is still in production. Follow us on social media to learn more about the game :
